00034 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 // Function: EndpointStack()
00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 EndpointStack::EndpointStack(ProgramEntityItem* parentNode) : QGraphicsRectItem(parentNode),
00038                                                               parentProgEntity_(parentNode),
00039                                                               headerLabel_(0), btnShowHide_(0),
00040                                                               noneRect_(0), noneLabel_(0),
00041                                                               btnAdd_(0), endpoints_(),
00042                                                               expanded_(true), editable_(true)
00043 {
00044     // Create the header rectangle.
00045     setBrush(QBrush(QColor(142, 200, 255)));
00046     setRect(-EndpointItem::WIDTH / 2, 0, EndpointItem::WIDTH, HEIGHT);
00047 
00048     // Create the header label.
00049     headerLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem(this);
00050     headerLabel_->setHtml(tr("<center>Endpoints</center>"));
00051     headerLabel_->setTextWidth(EndpointItem::WIDTH);
00052     headerLabel_->setPos(-headerLabel_->textWidth() / 2.0, 0);
00053 
00054     QFont font = headerLabel_->font();
00055     font.setBold(true);
00056     headerLabel_->setFont(font);
00057 
00058     // Create the show/hide button.
00059     if (expanded_)
00060     {
00061         btnShowHide_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/collapse.png"), this);
00062     }
00063     else
00064     {
00065         btnShowHide_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/expand.png"), this);
00066     }
00067 
00068     btnShowHide_->setPos(-EndpointItem::WIDTH / 2 + 1, 0);
00069 
00070     // Create the none rectangle and label.
00071     noneRect_ = new QGraphicsRectItem(-EndpointItem::WIDTH / 2, 0, EndpointItem::WIDTH, HEIGHT, this);
00072     noneRect_->setPos(0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT);
00073     noneRect_->setBrush(QBrush(QColor(215, 249, 217)));
00074     noneRect_->setVisible(expanded_);
00075 
00076     noneLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem(noneRect_);
00077     noneLabel_->setHtml(tr("<center>None</center>"));
00078     noneLabel_->setTextWidth(EndpointItem::WIDTH);
00079     noneLabel_->setPos(-noneLabel_->textWidth() / 2.0, 0);
00080 
00081     // Create the add button with an icon.
00082     btnAdd_ = new GraphicsRectButton(this);
00083     btnAdd_->setBrush(QBrush(QColor(215, 249, 217)));
00084     btnAdd_->setRect(EndpointItem::WIDTH / 2 - HEIGHT, 0, HEIGHT, HEIGHT);
00085     btnAdd_->setPos(0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT + HEIGHT);
00086     btnAdd_->setVisible(expanded_ && editable_);
00087     connect(btnAdd_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(addEndpoint()));
00088 
00089     QPixmap pixmap(":icons/graphics/add.png");
00090     QGraphicsPixmapItem* addIcon = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(pixmap.scaled(18, 18), btnAdd_);
00091     addIcon->setPos(EndpointItem::WIDTH / 2 - HEIGHT / 2 - 8, 1);
00092 }

00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 // Function: ~EndpointStack()
00096 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 EndpointStack::~EndpointStack()
00098 {
00099     // Free all endpoint ids.
00100     foreach (EndpointItem* endpoint, endpoints_)
00101     {
00102         if (endpoint->getPortID() >= 0)
00103         {
00104             parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent()->getPortIDFactory().freeID(endpoint->getPortID());
00105         }
00106     }
00107 }

00109 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 // Function: addEndpoint()
00111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 void EndpointStack::addEndpoint(QString const& name, MCAPIEndpointDirection dir, MCAPIDataType type)
00113 {
00114     EndpointItem* endpoint = new EndpointItem(parentProgEntity_, name, dir, type);
00115     connect(endpoint, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00116 
00117     endpoint->setPos(0, -endpoint->boundingRect().top() + MIN_Y_PLACEMENT +
00118                      endpoints_.size() * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00119 
00120     addEndpoint(endpoint);
00121 }
00122 
00123 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 // Function: addEndpoint()
00125 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 void EndpointStack::addEndpoint(EndpointItem* endpoint)
00127 {
00128     endpoint->setParentItem(this);
00129     endpoint->setVisible(expanded_);
00130 
00131     VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(endpoints_, endpoint, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00132     VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(endpoints_, 0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00133 
00134     btnAdd_->setPos(0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT + endpoints_.size() * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00135     noneRect_->setVisible(false);
00136 
00137     // Add the endpoint to the parent program entity's model parameters if the program entity is unpackaged.
00138     if (!parentProgEntity_->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00139     {
00140         QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modelParam(new ModelParameter());
00141         modelParam->setName(endpoint->getName());
00142         modelParam->setDataType(valueToString(endpoint->getConnectionType()));
00143         modelParam->setValue(valueToString(endpoint->getMCAPIDirection()));
00144 
00145         parentProgEntity_->componentModel()->getModel()->addModelParameter(modelParam);
00146     }
00147 
00148     endpoint->createBusInterface(parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent());
00149     emit visibleHeightChanged(getVisibleHeight());
00150     emit contentChanged();
00151 }
00152 
00153 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 // Function: removeEndpoint()
00155 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 void EndpointStack::removeEndpoint(EndpointItem* endpoint)
00157 {
00158     // Remove the endpoint and update endpoint positions.
00159     if (endpoints_.contains(endpoint))
00160     {
00161         // Free up the port ID.
00162         parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent()->getPortIDFactory().freeID(endpoint->getPortID());
00163 
00164         endpoints_.removeAll(endpoint);
00165         VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(endpoints_, 0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00166 
00167         // Update the none rectangle and add button accordingly.
00168         if (endpoints_.empty())
00169         {
00170             noneRect_->setVisible(true);
00171             btnAdd_->setPos(0, 2 * MIN_Y_PLACEMENT);
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175             btnAdd_->setPos(0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT + endpoints_.size() * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00176         }
00177 
00178         // Remove the endpoint from the parent program entity's model parameters.
00179         if (!parentProgEntity_->componentModel()->getVlnv()->isValid())
00180         {
00181             parentProgEntity_->componentModel()->getModel()->removeModelParameter(endpoint->getName());
00182         }
00183 
00184         // Remove the bus interface from the mapping component.
00185         endpoint->removeBusInterface(parentProgEntity_->getMappingComponent());
00186 
00187         // Inform others about the height change.
00188         emit visibleHeightChanged(getVisibleHeight());
00189         emit contentChanged();
00190     }
00191 }
00192 
00193 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 // Function: onMoveEndpoint()
00195 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 void EndpointStack::onMoveEndpoint(EndpointItem* endpoint)
00197 {
00198     setZValue(1001.0);
00199 
00200     // Restrict to horizontal center and clamp the vertical range.
00201     qreal y = std::min<qreal>(std::max(MIN_Y_PLACEMENT - endpoint->boundingRect().top(), endpoint->y()),
00202                               MIN_Y_PLACEMENT - endpoint->boundingRect().top() +
00203                               (endpoints_.size() - 1) * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00204     endpoint->setPos(snapPointToGrid(0, y));
00205 
00206     VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(endpoints_, endpoint, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00207 }
00208 
00209 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00210 // Function: onReleaseEndpoint()
00211 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 void EndpointStack::onReleaseEndpoint(EndpointItem* endpoint)
00213 {
00214     setZValue(0.0);
00215     VStackedLayout::setItemPos(endpoints_, endpoint, 0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00216 }

00218 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 // Function: addEndpoint()
00220 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00221 void EndpointStack::addEndpoint()
00222 {
00223     // Show a dialog for adding an endpoint.
00224     EndpointEditDialog dialog((QWidget*)scene()->parent());
00225 
00226     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
00227     {
00228         EndpointItem* endpoint = new EndpointItem(parentProgEntity_, dialog.getName(), dialog.getType(),
00229                                                   dialog.getConnectionType());
00230         connect(endpoint, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00231 
00232         endpoint->setPos(0, -endpoint->boundingRect().top() + MIN_Y_PLACEMENT +
00233                          endpoints_.size() * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00234 
00235         // Create an undo command and execute it.
00236         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd(new EndpointAddCommand(this, endpoint));
00237         static_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene())->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00238     }
00239 }

00241 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00243 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244 void EndpointStack::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00245 {
00246     if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
00247     {
00248         setExpanded(!isExpanded());
00249         event->accept();
00250     }
00251 }

00253 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 // Function: getVisibleHeight()
00255 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00256 int EndpointStack::getVisibleHeight() const
00257 {
00258     if (!expanded_)
00259     {
00260         return MIN_Y_PLACEMENT;
00261     }
00262 
00263     if (endpoints_.empty())
00264     {
00265         if (editable_)
00266         {
00267             return 3 * MIN_Y_PLACEMENT;
00268         }
00269         else
00270         {
00271             return 2 * MIN_Y_PLACEMENT;
00272         }
00273     }
00274 
00275     if (editable_)
00276     {
00277         return (2 * MIN_Y_PLACEMENT + endpoints_.size() * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00278     }
00279     else
00280     {
00281         return (MIN_Y_PLACEMENT + endpoints_.size() * EndpointItem::HEIGHT);
00282     }
00283 }

00299     btnAdd_->setVisible(expanded_ && editable_);

00302 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00303 // Function: setEndpointOrder()
00304 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00305 void EndpointStack::setEndpointOrder(QMap<QString, QPointF> const& positions)
00306 {
00307     QMapIterator<QString, QPointF> itrPos(positions);
00308 
00309     // Correct the ordering of the endpoints in the container.
00310     while (itrPos.hasNext())
00311     {
00312         itrPos.next();
00313         QString const& name = itrPos.key();
00314 
00315         for (int i = 0; i < endpoints_.size(); ++i)
00316         {
00317             if (endpoints_.at(i)->getName() == name)
00318             {
00319                 int index = int(itrPos.value().y());
00320 
00321                 if (index < endpoints_.size())
00322                 {
00323                     endpoints_.swap(i, index);
00324                 }
00325                 break;
00326             }
00327         }
00328     }
00329 
00330     // Update the actual positions.
00331     updateEndpointPositions();
00332 }
00333 
00334 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00335 // Function: updateEndpointPositions()
00336 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00337 void EndpointStack::updateEndpointPositions()
00338 {
00339     if (expanded_)
00340     {
00341         VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(endpoints_, 0, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00342     }
00343     else
00344     {
00345         for (int i = 0; i < endpoints_.size(); ++i)
00346         {
00347             endpoints_.at(i)->setPos(0.0, HEIGHT / 2);
00348         }
00349     }
00350 }

00355 bool EndpointStack::isExpanded() const
00356 {
00357     return expanded_;
00358 }

00360 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00361 // Function: setExpanded()
00362 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00363 void EndpointStack::setExpanded(bool expanded)
00364 {
00365     expanded_ = expanded;
00366 
00367     // Show/hide endpoints based on the current mode.
00368     for (int i = 0; i < endpoints_.size(); ++i)
00369     {
00370         endpoints_.at(i)->setVisible(expanded_);
00371     }
00372 
00373     updateEndpointPositions();
00374 
00375     noneRect_->setVisible(expanded_ && endpoints_.empty());
00376     btnAdd_->setVisible(expanded_ && editable_);
00377 
00378     // Update the button image.
00379     if (expanded_)
00380     {
00381         btnShowHide_->setPixmap(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/collapse.png"));
00382     }
00383     else
00384     {
00385         btnShowHide_->setPixmap(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/expand.png"));
00386     }
00387 
00388     emit visibleHeightChanged(getVisibleHeight());
00389 }
